attributes.action: Remove Pakistan from red list for travel
attributes.additional_details: To remove the ban of hotel quarantine! Help people come back to their homes and be with their families for Ramadan!
attributes.background: Remove Pakistan from the red list. Thousands of people are stuck in Pakistan! Families are struggling financially and don’t have enough to come wit! No direct flights are being run! Help us come home!
